The Rebuild America’s School Act helps not only our students, but also our economy. By investing more than $100 billion in school infrastructure, this bill would create 1.9 million good-paying jobs for local workers. #BuildSchoolsNotWalls

Every student, regardless of their family’s wealth, should have access to a safe, welcoming, and high-quality public school. That’s why I’m co-sponsoring the Rebuild America’s Schools Act. #BuildSchoolsNotWalls
The Rebuild America’s School Act would invest more than $100 billion to improve public schools across the country.  #BuildSchoolsNotWalls
Countless students attend school in crumbling buildings that are unsafe and not equipped with essential resources. This is simply unacceptable.

I joined our fellow Virginian, Chairman @BobbyScott, in introducing the #RebuildAmericasSchools Act so that we can invest money in our public schools to address critical physical and digital infrastructure needs in schools across the country.

Contrary to what President Trump said at the end of his speech, a #shutdown should never be the solution or even an option when governing. Everyone must be committed to finding a resolution without threatening or enacting another shutdown.

Negotiating policy differences can be done without closing the government, without depriving dedicated workers of their paychecks, and certainly without depriving Americans of needed services.
